org.steveleach.scoresheet.support

Class FileManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.steveleach.scoresheet.support.FileManager

  • public class FileManager
extends java.lang.Object
    File System helper.

    Application code should interact with the FileManager rather than directly, as it can be mocked for unit testing.

    Author:
    Steve Leach
